ComicInfo.Summary: COUNTDOWN TO ISSUE #200 REACHES ITS PENULTIMATE ISSUE! Malcolm Dragon tackles the deadly Demonoids! It's an allout underworld war as the Lava Lords, Ant-Menaces, and Demonoids battle it out for world domination—and whoever wins—we lose!! The surface world is on fire and the son of the Savage Dragon is in over his head!
ComicInfo.Writer: Erik Larsen,Gary Carlson,McKenzie,Simon Mallette St-Pierre,Chris Eliopoulos,McKenzie,Simon Mallette St-Pierre,Chris Eliopoulos,Gary Carlson,Erik Larsen
ComicInfo.Title: Broken Home
